title: "Your Shop" price bug
body:
Hello, I entered on my smurf account to see what I get from the Your Shop and the price is a bit messed up, for the 975 RP skins it makes them 1975 and for the Lee one 1855 or so.Proof below.
http://imgur.com/z4MraDj.png

replies.body: Ah, those prices that you're seeing are the price of the skins with the champion included since you don't currently own those champions. Your Shop skins for champions you don't already own will include the champion in the price. That way when you buy the skin, you get the champion for you can actually use the skin you bought ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Eiy1b4vQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-05T01:07:20.401+0000)
>
> Ah, those prices that you're seeing are the price of the skins with the champion included since you don't currently own those champions. Your Shop skins for champions you don't already own will include the champion in the price. That way when you buy the skin, you get the champion for you can actually use the skin you bought ^_^!

Yeah, I figured out later, thanks for telling me to clarify it tho, was too lazy to delete the topic {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
